data.text: @610CKTB Referring to wearing a mask as a "personal choice" during a once in a century Global Pandemic of an airborne virus is akin to saying smoking is a personal choice & ignoring the effects of second-hand smoke. Ford gov't caved into an uninformed base. https://t.co/C9ZDVr44mC
@610CKTB Alot of politicians in Niagara https://t.co/paPEbXUmmZ

@610CKTB @TheTMCShow @TimDenis1 
When does the ROA (Reopening Ontario Act) end? When it ends all the Covid19 regulations end with it I believe.
@RuckusCanuckus @610CKTB Kids have never wore masks properly, covid19 will spread with or without masks
@610CKTB How convenient that the science on masks in schools will change over March Break. 😆
